title: Is my MMR ok for my league?
body: Hi, so this is my first season and my MMR is 1,119 is that good considering I'm in bronze 3? Thanks :)

replies.body:
Bronze 4 is 970 average atm.

According to what op.gg tells me atleast

Yes bronze is gradually getting more trash.
you can tell by the screws who think they are hotstuff and can 1v1 someone 5 lvs ahead and win without dying
